default.description: Explore Database Management System lab assignments with SQL queries, MongoDB operations, PL/SQL programming, data import/export, and database connectivity using front-end tools.

questions.question: 1. SQL Queries:  Design and Develop SQL DDL statements which demonstrate the use of SQL objects such as Table, View, Index, Sequence, Synonym, different constraints etc. Write at least 10 SQL queries on a suitable database application using SQL DML statements. Note: Instructor will design the queries which demonstrate the use of concepts like Insert, Select, Update, Delete with operators, functions, and set operator etc.
questions.title: SQL DDL and DML Queries
